name: HKAuthorizationRequestStatus
desc: Values that indicate whether your app needs to request authorization from the user.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The authorization request status could not be determined because an error occurred.

items.name: case shouldRequest
items.desc: The application has not yet requested authorization for all the specified data types.

items.name: case unnecessary
items.desc: The application has already requested authorization for all the specified data types.
